name: 0.5 or worse angle change
desc: When triangulating the stronghold, the angle difference between the two eyes is 0.5 or less

name: 2+ flint in inv
desc: Has 2 or more flint in his inventory at the same time

name: 3+ eye breaks
desc: Finds an end portal that generates with 3 or more eyes filled in

name: 30+ obby
desc: Has 30 or more obsidian in his inventory at any given time

name: 4 or less explosives in end
desc: Has less than 4 total beds and respawn anchors when entering the end

name: 5+ minute nether enter
desc: Enteres the nether for the first time at 5 minutes or later of IGT

name: 5+ minute stronghold nav
desc: Spends 5 minutes or more in the stronghold looking for the portal room

name: Bedrock in overworld or nether
desc: Sees bedrock in either the overworld or the nether

name: Blacksmith
desc: Finds a blacksmith in a village

name: Blaze bed/tnt
desc: Use bed(s) or tnt to clear space at a blaze spawner

name: Blind into cave
desc: Spawns in a cave in the overworld from blind travel

name: Boat broken
desc: Boat breaks into sticks and planks

name: Boat clutch
desc: Successfully uses a bot to avoid fall damage

name: Cave lava enter
desc: Enters the nether using a lava pool in a cave

name: Cod strats
desc: Trades for a cod bucket in a village

name: Creeper in stronghold
desc: Finds a creeper in the stronghold

name: Dark oak forest
desc: Finds a dark oak forest biome

name: Dig down into lava
desc: Encounter lava while digging straight down

name: Digging for over a minute
desc: Spend 1 minute or longer digging underground

name: Doesn't use sword in inv
desc: Has a sword in inventory but doesnt use it

name: Double bad no triple stables
desc: Finds a stables bastion with no good gaps and no triple chest ramparts

name: Double blaze spawner
desc: Foretress has two blaze spawners close enough to each other to play both at the same time

name: Eats raw meat
desc: Eats a piece of raw meat

name: Educated travel
desc: Uses one eye of ender to determine the direction of the nearest stronghold without estimating the distance

name: Enderman aggroed
desc: Cause an enderman to start attacking you

name: Endermite
desc: Endermite spawns after throwing an ender pearl

name: Endermite chases crawling couri
desc: Endermite spawns and starts chasing Couri down a crawl mining tunnel

name: Enters end without arrows
desc: Enters the end without any arrows or enough materials to craft them

name: Enters pr through way other than front entrance
desc: Enters portal room from any method other than the front entrance (side entrance, mining, etc)

name: Failed zero
desc: Attempts to do a zero cycle but the dragon doesn't die

name: Fails boat clutch
desc: Attempts to use a boat to prevent fall damage but fails

name: Fastion
desc: Find a bastion and a foretress very close to each other

name: Fort first
desc: Plays the foretress as the first nether structure

name: Gets bridge backup blocks
desc: Mines the backup gold blocks in a bridge bastion

name: Ghost bucket
desc: Contents of a bucket get desynced and the bucket item displays contents that differs from its actual contents

name: Glowstone in bastion
desc: Patch of glowstone inside a bastion

name: Glowstone on blaze spawner
desc: Patch of glowstone right by a blaze spawner, blocking spawning space

name: Ground zero
desc: Perform a ground zero to kill the dragon

name: Half a heart
desc: Be at half a heart of health

name: Hit by wither skeleton
desc: Get hit by a wither skeleton

name: Hoe
desc: Obtain a hoe of any material

name: Hunger reset
desc: Intentionally die to reset health and hunger

name: Lava housing
desc: Find a housing bastion with lava flowing inside it

name: Lava on blaze spawner
desc: Lava flows on a blaze spawner

name: Leaves with less than 20 obby
desc: Leaves the bastion with less than 20 obby

name: Less than 6 iron from ship/bt
desc: Ship or bt contain less than 6 iron

name: Looting sword
desc: Obtain a sword enchanted with looting

name: Magma cube in fort
desc: Find a magma cube in the fortress

name: Magma ravine enter
desc: Use a magma ravine to enter the nether

name: Mines bottom treasure gold
desc: Mines the gold blocks in the bottom section of a treasure bastion

name: Mob changes dimension
desc: Mob goes through a portal to a different dimension

name: Mountain stronghold digdown
desc: Dig down to the stronghold in a mountain biome

name: Multiple bastions in one run
desc: Trade multiple bastions in a single run

name: Netherite tool/armor
desc: Upgrade a diamond item to netherite

name: Nether portal into stronghold
desc: When exiting the nether, the overworld portal spawns inside the stronghold

name: No bow/crossbow in end
desc: Be in the end without a bow or a crossbow

name: Ocean exposed portal room
desc: Portal room is visible from the ocean surface

name: Over 30 min run
desc: Have a run with a final time 30 minutes or longer

name: Overworld enderman
desc: Find an enderman in the overworld

name: Pausing to clutch
desc: Pauses the game to figure out how to avoid dying

name: Pearl hangs
desc: Throws a pearl and unloads the chunks so it lands at a desired later time

name: Poundy portal
desc: Mess up while building a nether portal

name: Reverse eye spy
desc: While calculating the distance to the stronghold, throw two eyes and have them point to different strongholds

name: Set spawn in nether
desc: Uses a respawn anchor to set a spawnpoint in the nether

name: SSV
desc: Finds a soul sand valley biome

name: SSV fort
desc: Finds a fortress in a soul sand valley

name: Sub 20 min run
desc: Completes a run with a final time of 20 minutes or less

name: Surface lava enter
desc: Uses a surface lava pool to enter the nether

name: Tree on blaze spawner
desc: Have a tree at the blaze spawner

name: Trident guy
desc: Find a drowned holding a trident

name: Uses pickaxe as weapon
desc: Use a pickaxe as a weapon

name: Wears golden pants
desc: Obtains and wears a pair of golden pants

name: Woodlight
desc: Lights a nether portal by having wood catch on fire and spread into the portal
